## TaskContextData

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/tasks/src/context.ts" sourceLine="10" packageName="@commandkit/tasks" />

Data structure for creating a task execution context.

This interface contains all the necessary information to create a task context,
including the task instance, custom data, and CommandKit instance.

```ts title="Signature"
interface TaskContextData<T extends Record<string, any> = Record<string, any>> {
    task: Task;
    data: T;
    commandkit: CommandKit;
}
```

<div className="members-wrapper">

### task

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/tasks/classes/task#task'>Task</a>`}   />

The task instance that is being executed
### data

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`T`}   />

Custom data passed to the task execution
### commandkit

<MemberInfo kind="property" type={`<a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/classes/command-kit#commandkit'>CommandKit</a>`}   />

The CommandKit instance for accessing bot functionality


</div>
